page.title: 07A FAMILY SUNDAY
page.content: I am the first up on Sunday. I have a wash. Then I have cornflakes and I go to see if anyone else is awake. I get dressed. My big brother Andrew is next up he washes himself and gets dressed. Andrew and I go to feed the chickens. My mum and dad get up, they do not have any breakfast. They wash and comb their hair. We come back from the chickens.Daniel gets up. The last people to get up are the twins Patrick and Lindsey they are little babies. We watch the televison until dinner time. On Sunday we usually have potatoes, carrots, cabbage, and a chicken. For pudding we have strawberries and cream. Andrew and I wash the pots. We watch a film on tv. We soon go out to play. Andrew,Daniel and I play wars until tea.For tea we have salad,cakes and icecream. We play cards until 9.00pm,then go to bed.
